content: one skein skinny scarf supplies redheart boutique unforgettable yarn - sunrise 3 5oz/270yds hook g 4 25mm tapestry needle scissors gauge 4 ½ x 4 ½ = 7vst+2dc x 8 row abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet vst v_stitch double_crochet ch1 double_crochet notes ch3 counts as stitch instructions row1 ch25 vst in 5th chain from hook *skip 2chs vst in next chain repeat from * to last 2chs skip 1ch double_crochet in turning chain turn row 2 ch3 vst in 1ch of each vst to last chain double_crochet in turning chain turn repeat row 2 until skein is finished or desired length weave ends 1 e g a p this is either a free or paid pattern which is protected under copyright law please do not post this pattern as your own on any platform without my permission you are more than welcome to link the pattern back to https //crochetstyles4u com let s always remember to respect the designer and give credit where it s due if you have any questions please email me at crochetstyles4u@gmail com www crochetstyles4u com www facebook com/crochetstyles4u
